column5: As of today, the wife and i are taking every friday off, until the end of September. That will give us lots of fishing time We headed out at 9 this morning and caught our first fish in the new boat. Ya its a perch, but who cares it slimed the boat!!!!  We caught a nice meal of perch, then this little bugger hit. I havent caught a Barbotte(local for catfish)  They are sposed to be good, but i have never tried them, and have no idea how to clean or cook them. Finally, this guy hit my worm like a freight train.He wasnt the biggest pike i have caught, but who cares, its slime   Now some scenery.    So Do i get my man card back now, even if i use multiple emoticons to express how i feel
No man card, you still have the glove fetish.  Good outing for you guys.
Nope.........No man card!!!!   As long as your wearing that annoying clothing around your neck
Right on Paul! Didya get a little slime on the carpet yet? How come no pics of the capt at the helm?
Nope no man card from me either....your catfish hold looks like how my 7 year old niece would hold it...   Art
Good job today... Taking Fridays off will make this summer unreal for you and your wife... You'll get first crack at the fish before the weekend anglers...

Man You guys are a tuff Crew ! Ok, Got to take the PFD off when not moving....Check Remove the Jackson glove when unhooking snot rockets.....check dont grab those little bugger catfish like a 7 year old..........Maybe They feel like a wet noodle with 3" spikes on thier sides
That didnt take too long to get it slimed
multi imodicons -another 1...   Art
Yer on the ball tonite
nice going Paul
Congrads paul! You beat me, and I have had my boat a lot longer than you have. Inflatable while standing and casting, good idea, you seem to be losing your natural bouyancy.
Good job Paul. Sounds like you're going to have a great summer.
or perhaps its just reloacting to a more central location?
I'll give you a card, you got the new machine wet fishin. Plus you caught the #1 sot after game fish and it was first, Perch
Nice job Paul. Glad to see you got out and landed some fish in the new boat. Not a bad pike for the first of many to come I'm sure.
+1 for wearing the PFD. +1 for catching fish. A big +1 for that seet moustache of yours. -1 for the glove (you need to man up a bit on the glove front)  Congrats.
Do what ever you want Paul.. many are just jealous you're out there fishing and they're not!
I fished that area last July Paul. It was so weed choked outside of the small boat channel.
Clean as a whistle today D, Some new weed growth, but besides that, clean. There was a hole load of debris though. From logs to a dead deer
nice
Oh, you mean the boat!!
I was wearing glove all last week and she said, take off that   glove and order the part for the dryer! I'll check in with you soon. Enjoy your Fridays.  A
Good stuff Paul.....  Man card....pfffffft....overated.......get some pink gloves.
nice day on the water paul congrats
